$(document).ready(function() {
    "use strict";

    if($('.glb-grid-24')){

        var cardId = '#ge-card-classificacao-1052930c-8dad-4c81-9883-e7029896110f',
                classificacaoFeedReady = false,
                classificacaoCardReady = false;

            $(document).on('bastian-feed-card_rendered', cardId, function() {
                console.debug('Classificacao: Feed Ready');
                classificacaoFeedReady = true;
                initCardClassificacao();
            });

            $(document).on('card-classificacao-ready', function() {
                console.debug('Classificacao: Card Ready');
                classificacaoCardReady = true;
                initCardClassificacao();
            });

        var initCardClassificacao = function(){
            if(classificacaoCardReady && classificacaoFeedReady){
                $('#ge-card-classificacao-1052930c-8dad-4c81-9883-e7029896110f').show();
            }
        }
    }

    try {

      var classificacao = new CardClassificacao({
        context: '#ge-card-classificacao-1052930c-8dad-4c81-9883-e7029896110f'
      });

      var classificacaoTracking = new CardClassificacaoTracking("1052930c-8dad-4c81-9883-e7029896110f");

    } catch (err) {}

});
</script></div><div class="areatemplate-esquerda

class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">campeonato carioca</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon gui-icon-clock"></i><span class="feed-post-time-label">ontem</span></span></div><a href="http://globoesporte.globo.com/rj/futebol/campeonato-carioca/noticia/2017/03/bota-vence-bangu-e-entra-na-zona-de-classificacao-para-semifinal-do-carioca.html" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">Bota vence Bangu e entra na zona de classificação para semifinal do Carioca</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Time, contudo, ainda não tem vaga na fase decisiva da Taça Rio. Joel e Sassá (de pênalti) garantiram resultado em Moça Bonita. Pimpão foi expulso no primeiro tempo</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="10"><div><div class="feed-post             elenco
        </h1></header><!-- gerado em: 2017-03-27T19:30:29Z -->



    

    <section class="gui-card-content ge-card-elenco-grupado" data-agregador-id="elenco_carioca-2017_263">
        <div class="ge-card-elenco-wrapper">
            <div class="gui-tab">

                    <li class="gui-tab-item gui-is-activated gui-color-primary gui-color-primary-border-bottom"><span class="ge-card-elenco-tab-extenso">Goleiros</span><span class="ge-card-elenco-tab-abreviacao">Gol</span></li>

                </ul>
            </div>
            <div class="nano">
                <div class="ge-card-elenco-content ativo content tipo-elenco">
                    
                        <h1 class="gui-tab-target ge-card-elenco-categoria" >Goleiros</h1>
                        <ul class="ge-card-elenco-jogadores">
                            
                              <li class="ge-card-elenco-jogador">

                                    </span>

                                      <span class="ge-card-elenco-jogador-detalhes">28 anos

                                    <div class="ge-card-elenco-jogador-votos"></div>
                                
                                
                                
                                
                              </li>

    var glb_realtime_map = {
        site: 'globoesporte',
        categories: ['home'],
        url: 'http://globoesporte.globo.com/futebol/times/botafogo/'
    };

    var realtime = function(realtimeLoaded, msg){
        if(realtimeLoaded){
            return;
        }

        $.getScript('http://s.glbimg.com/bu/rt/js/glb-rt.js', function(){
            $.ajax({
                dataType: 'jsonp',
                
                url: 'http://s.glbimg.com/es/ge/static/live/globoesporte/json/globoesporte-home-agregador.js',
                
                jsonpCallback: 'glbrealtime_callback',
                cache: true,
                success: function(json){
                    $.glbrealtime({
                        data: json,
                        debug: false
                    });
                }
            });
        });
    }

    var realtimeLoaded = false;

    $(window).on('load', function(){
        realtime(realtimeLoaded, "onLoad");
        realtimeLoaded = true;
    })

    setTimeout(function(){
        realtime(realtimeLoaded, "timeout")
        realtimeLoaded = true;
    }, 3000);

</script><link rel="stylesheet"
                  media="screen"
                  href="//s.glbimg.com/gl/ba/css/barra-globocom.min.css"
                  type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript">(function(){glb.barra={exibeAssineJa:true,exibeCentral:true,iframe:false};var s=document.createElement("script");s.type="text/javascript";s.async=true;s.charset="utf-8";s.src="//s.glbimg.com/gl/ba/js/barra-globocom.min.js";var ss=document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];ss.parentNode.insertBefore(s,ss);})();</script></body>

<script type="text/JavaScript">
// <![CDATA[

var $j = jQuery.noConflict();
//color box
var cont = 0; //variavel cartao de natal
$j(document).ready(function() {
           
		 $j(".box1").colorbox({ iframe:true, innerWidth:1160, innerHeight:900, onOpen:function(){} });
         	 $j(".box2").colorbox({ iframe:true, innerWidth:780, innerHeight:300, onOpen:function(){} });
                 $j(".box3").colorbox({ iframe:true, innerWidth:760, innerHeight:630, onOpen:function(){} });
                 $j(".box4").colorbox({ iframe:true, innerWidth:616, innerHeight:745, onOpen:function(){} }); 
                 $j(".links img").css("cursor", "pointer");
                $j(".links img:first").css('opacity','0.3');
                $j(".links img").click(function () {
                    $j(".links img").css('opacity','1.0');
                    var link = $j(this).attr("id");
                    $j(this).css('opacity','0.3');

                    $j(".video_prin").html(
                      "<video poster=\"http://videosonline.cptec.inpe.br/~rvonline/filmes/flv/" + link + ".jpg\" width=\"390\" height=\"306\" title=\"" + $j(this).attr("title") + "\" controls=\"controls\" preload=\"preload\">"+
                    	"<source src=\"http://videosonline.cptec.inpe.br/~rvonline/filmes/webm/" + link + ".webm\" type='video/webm; codecs=\"vp8.0, vorbis\"'>"+
                      "<source src=\"http://videosonline.cptec.inpe.br/~rvonline/filmes/mp4/" + link + ".mp4\" type='video/mp4; codecs=\"avc1.4D401E, mp4a.40.2\"'>"+
                      "<source src=\"http://videosonline.cptec.inpe.br/~rvonline/filmes/ogv/" + link + ".ogv\" type='video/ogg; codecs=\"theora, vorbis\"'>"+
                      "<p>Video não está visível</p></video>");

                      addEventVideo();
                      addEventClick();
                  });

		var cook = document.cookie;

		if(cook.indexOf("ja_viu") == -1) {
			$j("#banner-aviso").show();
			//$j("#pop-up").css("left", (screen.width/2-258.5) + "px");
			//$j("#pop-up").css("top", (screen.height/2-200) + "px");
		}

$j("#foo2").carouFredSel({
   // width   : 370,   // automatically calculated
  height    : 115,   // automatically calculated
  circular: false,
  infinite: false,
  auto  : false,
  items   : {
    visible     : 4,   //  automatically calculated
    minimum     : null,   //  items.visible
    start     : 0,
    width   : 91,   // automatically calculated
   height    : 50,   // automatically calculated  
   filter      : null
  },
  prev  : { 
    button  : "#foo2_prev",
    key   : "left"
  },
  next  : { 
    button  : "#foo2_next",
    key   : "right"
  },
  pagination  : "#foo2_pag",

});
    
});




/* contagem de visualizacoes do video */

document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
    addEventVideo();
    addEventClick();
});

function addEventVideo() {
    var video = document.getElementsByTagName('video')[0];
    video.addEventListener("play", function(e) {
        _gaq.push(["_trackEvent","Video iniciado: " + ((video.getAttribute('title') != null)?video.getAttribute('title'):"Previsao Diaria"), e.type, video.currentSrc]);
    }, false);
    video.addEventListener("ended", function(e) {
        _gaq.push(["_trackEvent","Video finalizado: " + ((video.getAttribute('title') !== null)?video.getAttribute('title'):"Previsao Diaria"), e.type, video.currentSrc]);
    }, false);
}

function addEventClick() {
    var linkNoticia = document.getElementsByClassName('ver-noticia')[0];
    var btnFechar = document.getElementsByClassName('fechar')[0];
    linkNoticia.addEventListener("click", function(e) {
        _gaq.push(["_trackEvent","Link da noticia clicado: " + linkNoticia.getAttribute('href'), e.type, linkNoticia.getAttribute('href')]);
    }, false);
    btnFechar.addEventListener("ended", function(e) {
        _gaq.push(["_trackEvent","Banner fechado", e.type, "Banner aviso modelos fechado"]);
    }, false);
}

//script cartão de natal

	function fecharPopUp() {
		document.getElementById("banner-aviso").style.display = "none";
		var d = new Date();
		d.setTime(d.getTime() + (12*60*60*1000));
		var expires = "expires="+d.toUTCString();
		document.cookie = "ja_viu=true; " + expires + "; path=/";
	}

        function abrirPopUp() {
		document.getElementById("banner-aviso").style.display = "block";
                cont = 0;
                document.cookie = "ja_viu=; expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 UTC";
	}

	window.setInterval(function() {
		var cook = document.cookie;

		if(cook.indexOf("ja_viu") == -1)
			cont++;

		if(cont == 18)
			document.getElementById("banner-aviso").style.display = "none";
	}, 1000);

//fim script cartão de natal

function MM_swapImgRestore() { //v3.0
  var i,x,a=document.MM_sr; for(i=0;a&&i<a.length&&(x=a[i])&&x.oSrc;i++) x.src=x.oSrc;
}

function MM_preloadImages() { //v3.0
  var d=document; if(d.images){ if(!d.MM_p) d.MM_p=new Array();
    var i,j=d.MM_p.length,a=MM_preloadImages.arguments; for(i=0; i<a.length; i++)
    if (a[i].indexOf("#")!=0){ d.MM_p[j]=new Image; d.MM_p[j++].src=a[i];}}
}

function MM_findObj(n, d) { //v4.01
  var p,i,x;  if(!d) d=document; if((p=n.indexOf("?"))>0&&parent.frames.length) {
    d=parent.frames[n.substring(p+1)].document; n=n.substring(0,p);}
  if(!(x=d[n])&&d.all) x=d.all[n]; for (i=0;!x&&i<d.forms.length;i++) x=d.forms[i][n];
  for(i=0;!x&&d.layers&&i<d.layers.length;i++) x=MM_findObj(n,d.layers[i].document);
  if(!x && d.getElementById) x=d.getElementById(n); return x;
}

function MM_jumpMenu(targ,selObj,restore){ //v3.0
  eval(targ+".location='"+selObj.options[selObj.selectedIndex].value+"'");
  if (restore) selObj.selectedIndex=0;
}

function MM_swapImage() { //v3.0
  var i,j=0,x,a=MM_swapImage.arguments; document.MM_sr=new Array; for(i=0;i<(a.length-2);i+=3)
   if ((x=MM_findObj(a[i]))!=null){document.MM_sr[j++]=x; if(!x.oSrc) x.oSrc=x.src; x.src=a[i+2];}
}



//
/*
var slidespeed=10000
  "");
 )

var newwindow=1 //open links in new window? 1=yes, 0=no

var imageholder=new Array()
var ie=document.all
for (i=0;i<slideimages.length;i++){
imageholder[i]=new Image()
imageholder[i].src=slideimages[i]
}

function gotoshow(){
if (newwindow)
window.open(slidelinks[whichlink])

else
window.location=slidelinks[whichlink]
}*/
// ]]>
</script>


</head>

}

<script>
function fechar(){
$j("#reuniaoClimatica").hide();
}

var DataSaida = new Date("02/23/2017 20:00:00");
var DataHoje = new Date();

if(DataHoje < DataSaida){

console.log("fica");
setTimeout(fechar, 15000);
}else{
console.log("sai");
$j("#reuniaoClimatica").hide();
}
</script>

	<div class="tit_e"><img src="/~rwww1/common/img/ponto_laranja.gif" style="vertical-align:middle" alt="Difusão do Conhecimento" />Difusão do Conhecimento</div>
	<div class="educacional">
  <!--<div class="edu1">
  <script type="text/JavaScript" language="JavaScript1.1">
// <![CDATA[
//Presentational Slideshow Script- By Dynamic Drive
//For full source code and more DHTML scripts, visit http://www.dynamicdrive.com
//This credit MUST stay intact for legal use

var slideshow_width='140px' //SET SLIDESHOW WIDTH (set to largest image's width if multiple dimensions exist)
var slideshow_height='101px' //SET SLIDESHOW HEIGHT (set to largest image's height if multiple dimensions exist)
var pause=14000 //SET PAUSE BETWEEN SLIDE (2000=2 seconds)
var slidebgcolor="white"

var dropimages=new Array()
//SET IMAGE PATHS. Extend or contract array as needed

dropimages[0]="/~rwww1/difusao/agenda2016_mini.png";
dropimages[1]="/~rwww1/difusao/banner_workshop.png"

var droplinks=new Array()
//SET IMAGE URLs. Use "" if you wish particular image to NOT be linked:1

droplinks[0]="http://difusaoconhecimento.cptec.inpe.br/";
droplinks[1]="http://chuvaproject.cptec.inpe.br/portal/workshop_ilhabela/index.html"

var droptexto=new Array()
//SET IMAGE URLs. Use "" if you wish particular image to NOT be linked:
droptexto[0]="<div class='f1'>Agenda 2016</div><br />Agenda de cursos e eventos para 2016";
droptexto[1]="<div class='f1'>Workshop</div><br />Aerosol-Cloud-Precipitation";
////NO need to edit beyond here/////////////

var preloadedimages=new Array()
for (p=0;p<dropimages.length;p++){
preloadedimages[p]=new Image()
preloadedimages[p].src=dropimages[p]
}

var ie4=document.all
var dom=document.getElementById

if (ie4||dom)
document.write('<div style="position:relative;width:'+slideshow_width+';height:'+slideshow_height+';overflow:hidden"><div id="canvas0" style="position:absolute;width:'+slideshow_width+';height:'+slideshow_height+';background-color:'+slidebgcolor+';left:-'+slideshow_width+'"></div><div id="canvas1" style="position:absolute;width:'+slideshow_width+';height:'+slideshow_height+';background-color:'+slidebgcolor+';left:-'+slideshow_width+'"></div></div>')
else
document.write('<a href="javascript:rotatelink()"><img name="defaultslide" src="'+dropimages[0]+'" border="0" alt="'+droptexto[0]+'" /></a>"'+droptexto[0])

var curpos=parseInt(slideshow_width)*(-1)
var degree=10
var curcanvas="canvas0"
var curimageindex=linkindex=0
var nextimageindex=1


function movepic(){
if (curpos<0){
curpos=Math.min(curpos+degree,0)
tempobj.style.left=curpos+"px"
}
else{

clearInterval(dropslide)
nextcanvas=(curcanvas=="canvas0")? "canvas0" : "canvas1"
tempobj=ie4? eval("document.all."+nextcanvas) : document.getElementById(nextcanvas)
var slideimage='<img src="'+dropimages[curimageindex]+'" border="0" alt="CPTEC" />'
//alert(slideimage);
tempobj.innerHTML=(droplinks[curimageindex]!="")? '<a href="'+droplinks[curimageindex]+'">'+slideimage+'</a>' : slideimage
nextimageindex=(nextimageindex<dropimages.length-1)? nextimageindex+1 : 0
setTimeout("rotateimage()",pause)
}
}

function rotateimage(){
if (ie4||dom){
resetit(curcanvas)
var crossobj=tempobj=ie4? eval("document.all."+curcanvas) : document.getElementById(curcanvas)
crossobj.style.zIndex++
var temp='setInterval("movepic()",10)'
dropslide=eval(temp)
curcanvas=(curcanvas=="canvas0")? "canvas1" : "canvas0"
}
else
document.images.defaultslide.src=dropimages[curimageindex]
document.getElementById('teste').innerHTML=droptexto[curimageindex]
linkindex=curimageindex
curimageindex=(curimageindex<dropimages.length-1)? curimageindex+1 : 0
}

function rotatelink(){
if (droplinks[linkindex]!="")
window.location=droplinks[linkindex]
}

function resetit(what){
curpos=parseInt(slideshow_width)*(-1)
var crossobj=ie4? eval("document.all."+what) : document.getElementById(what)
crossobj.style.left=curpos+"px"
}

function startit(){
var crossobj=ie4? eval("document.all."+curcanvas) : document.getElementById(curcanvas)
crossobj.innerHTML='<a href="'+droplinks[curimageindex]+'"><img src="'+dropimages[curimageindex]+'" border="0" alt="CPTEC" /></a>'
rotateimage()
}
if (ie4||dom)
window.onload=startit
else
setInterval("rotateimage()",pause)

//]]>
</script>
	
  <div id="teste"></div>
   </div>-->

Os usuários deverão sempre mencionar a fonte das informações e dados como "CPTEC/INPE"<br /><br />
A geração e a divulgação de produtos operacionais obedecem critérios sistêmicos de controle de qualidade, padronização e periodicidade de disponibilização.  Em nenhum caso o CPTEC/INPE pode ser responsabilizado por danos especiais, indiretos ou decorrentes, ou nenhum dano vinculado ao que provenha do uso destes produtos.

<div class="r7box" id="articles-by-tags-57fc0b0da4fd541f9100a0a1">
<div id="article" class="r7cl5 r7alpha listing">
<div class="nwl-heading">
<h2 class="r7list-title"> Últimas Notícias </h2>
<a href="#" class="nwl-more-link">Veja mais</a>
</div>
<div class="loading-articles">
<p class="r7-loading-img"></p>
<p>Carregando...</p>
</div>
<div class="nwl-wrapper">
<ul class="nwl-news-of-day" id="articles">
<script id="articles-template" type="text/x-handlebars-template">
          {{#each articles}}            

            <li id="nativeads_position_{{@index}}" class="{{#not_empty cover_image_url}}nwl-has-img{{/not_empty}} nwl-row {{#if showDate}}new-date{{/if}}">     

              {{#if showDate}}
                <h6 class="nwl-date"> {{dateFormat first_published_at}} </h6>
              {{/if}}
              <div class="clearfix"></div>
              <div class="wrap-li">
                <span class="nwl-news-time">{{timeFormat first_published_at}}</span>

                {{#not_empty cover_image_url}}
                <span data-href="{{url}}" title="{{treatment_title title}}" class="nwl-wpr-cover box">
                  <div class="r7-shareit-holder">                      
                      <div class="image-holder" style="position: relative">
                      <img alt="" class="article-video-icon-tag" style="{{#not_empty is_video}}display: block{{/not_empty}}" src="data:image/png;base64," />

                        <a href="{{url}}" title="{{treatment_title title}}" data-social-headline="{{section_name}}"  data-social-lead="{{treatment_title title}}" data-shorten="{{url}}" target="{{is_r7_domain url}}">
                            <img class="nwl-cover-reference" src="{{treatment_image cover_image_url}}" title="{{treatment_title title}}" width="180" height="95" />
                        </a>
                            <div class="r7-shareit-bar no-text">
        <ul class="r7-shareit small">
          <li data-social-type="facebook" title="Compartilhe no Facebook" class="r7-icons r7-facebook shareit"></li>
          <li data-social-type="twitter" title="Compartilhe no Twitter" class="r7-icons r7-twitter shareit"></li>
          <li data-social-type="gPlus" title="Compartilhe no Google Plus" class="r7-icons r7-gPlus shareit"></li>
          <li data-social-type="pinterest" title="Compartilhe no Pinterest" class="r7-icons r7-pinterest shareit"></li>
        </ul>
    </div>

                      </div>                      
                  </div>
                </span>
                {{/not_empty}}

                <div class="nwl-info">
                  <div class="r7-shareit-holder">
                    <p class="nwl-news-title">
                      <a href="{{section_url}}" class="nwl-section nw-link bullet content_scheme" target="{{is_r7_domain section_url}}">{{section_name}}</a>
                    </p>
                    <p class="nwl-news-title link-holder">
                      <a data-social-headline="{{section_name}}"  data-social-lead="{{treatment_title title}}" data-shorten="{{url}}" href="{{url}}" title="{{treatment_title title}}" class="nwl-link" target="{{is_r7_domain url}}">
                        {{treatment_title title}}
                      </a>
                      <img class="hidden" src="{{cover_image_url}}" />

                    <div class="r7-social-media-bar">
                      <ul class="r7-social-media mini" data-shorten="{{url}}" data-image="{{cover_image_url}}" data-lead="{{treatment_title title}}" data-headline="{{section_name}}">
                        <li class="r7-share r7-icons r7-facebook shareit" data-social-type="facebook" title="Compartilhe no Facebook">
                          Compartilhe no Facebook
                        </li>
                        <li class="r7-share r7-icons r7-twitter shareit" data-social-type="twitter" title="Compartilhe no Twitter">
                          Compartilhe no Twitter
                        </li>
                        <li class="r7-share r7-icons r7-gPlus shareit" data-social-type="gPlus" title="Compartilhe no Google Plus">
                          Compartilhe no Google Plus
                        </li>
                      </ul>
                    </div>

                    </p>
                  </div>
                </div>

              </div>
            </li>
          {{/each}}
        </script>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
<div class="clearfix"></div>

</div>
